DataElementConcept.preferredName: Breast Negative Surgical Margin Missing Value Reason
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: One of two hemispheric projections of variable size situated in the subcutaneous layer over the pectoralis major muscle on either side of the chest.:definition pending_A specific reason explaining why a meaningful value is not available.  A meaningful value answers the question posed by a Data Element Concept.  In contrast, a Missing Value Reason answers the implicit question "Why is there no 'meaningful' value?", when there is none.

Concepts.definition: One of two hemispheric projections of variable size situated in the subcutaneous layer over the pectoralis major muscle on either side of the chest.
Indicates the absence of tumor cells at the edge of a surgically excised specimen.

Property.preferredDefinition: A specific reason explaining why a meaningful value is not available.  A meaningful value answers the question posed by a Data Element Concept.  In contrast, a Missing Value Reason answers the implicit question "Why is there no 'meaningful' value?", when there is none.
